segments.text: So are you going to get a new swimsuit ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , I think I'll get this one-piece .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why don't you get a bikini ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm too fat for a bikini .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You aren't fat . I'll bet you'd look great in a bikini . How about this thong bikini ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll wear that if you'll wear these Speedos .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I guess that one-piece isn't too bad , either . ( to be continued )
segments.speaker: S1
